    93038-8Stress level
    69858-9Because of a physical, mental, or emotional condition, do you have serious difficulty concentrating, remembering, or making decisions

    96780-2Wants help finding or keeping work or a job

    56799-0Address

    63512-8How many people are living or staying at this address [#]

    88124-3Food insecurity risk [HVS]

name: USCoreCommonSDOHAssessments
title: US Core Common SDOH Assessments
description:
Common SDOH assessment concepts covering the following categories (Gravity Project SDOH Domains):
 - Food (Food Insecurity)
 - Housing (Housing Instability)
 - Health (Social Connection, Stress)
 - Employment (Employment Status)
 - Care (SDOH Category Unspecified)
 - Transit (Transportation Insecurity)
 - Money (Financial Insecurity)
 - Goods (Material Hardship)
 - Education (SDOH Category Unspecified)
 - Legal (SDOH Category Unspecified)
